text: Vlado Smokvina (5 May 1908 - 16 April 1982) was a Yugoslav swimmer. He competed in two events at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Croatian male swimmers Category:Yugoslav male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Yugoslavia Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rijeka Category:People from Fiume
title: Vlado Smokvina
